00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats
00029 {
00033     public class VCard
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00040         public VCard()
00041         {
00042             Relationships = new List<Relationship>();
00043         }
00044 
00045         #endregion
00046 
00047         #region Public Functions
00048 
00053         public string GetVCard()
00054         {
00055             try
00056             {
00057                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00058                 Builder.Append("BEGIN:VCARD\r\nVERSION:2.1\r\n");
00059                 Builder.Append("FN:");
00060                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Prefix))
00061                 {
00062                     Builder.Append(Prefix).Append(" ");
00063                 }
00064                 Builder.Append(FirstName + " ");
00065                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(MiddleName))
00066                 {
00067                     Builder.Append(MiddleName).Append(" ");
00068                 }
00069                 Builder.Append(LastName);
00070                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Suffix))
00071                 {
00072                     Builder.Append(" ").Append(Suffix);
00073                 }
00074                 Builder.Append("\r\n");
00075 
00076                 Builder.Append("N:");
00077                 Builder.Append(LastName).Append(";").Append(FirstName).Append(";")
00078                     .Append(MiddleName).Append(";").Append(Prefix).Append(";")
00079                     .Append(Suffix).Append("\r\n");
00080                 Builder.Append("TEL;WORK:").Append(DirectDial).Append("\r\n");
00081                 Builder.Append("EMAIL;INTERNET:").Append(StripHTML(Email)).Append("\r\n");
00082                 Builder.Append("TITLE:").Append(Title).Append("\r\n");
00083                 Builder.Append("ORG:").Append(Organization).Append("\r\n");
00084                 Builder.Append("END:VCARD\r\n");
00085                 return Builder.ToString();
00086             }
00087             catch { throw; }
00088         }
00089 
00094         public string GetHCard()
00095         {
00096             try
00097             {
00098                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00099                 Builder.Append("<div class=\"vcard\">");
00100                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Url))
00101                 {
00102                     Builder.Append("<div class=\"fn\">");
00103                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Prefix))
00104                     {
00105                         Builder.Append(Prefix).Append(" ");
00106                     }
00107                     Builder.Append(FirstName).Append(" ");
00108                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(MiddleName))
00109                     {
00110                         Builder.Append(MiddleName).Append(" ");
00111                     }
00112                     Builder.Append(LastName);
00113                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Suffix))
00114                     {
00115                         Builder.Append(" ").Append(Suffix);
00116                     }
00117                     Builder.Append("</div>");
00118                 }
00119                 else
00120                 {
00121                     Builder.Append("<a class=\"fn url\" href=\"").Append(Url).Append("\"");
00122                     if (Relationships.Count > 0)
00123                     {
00124                         Builder.Append(" rel=\"");
00125                         foreach (Relationship Relationship in Relationships)
00126                         {
00127                             Builder.Append(Relationship.ToString()).Append(" ");
00128                         }
00129                         Builder.Append("\"");
00130                     }
00131                     Builder.Append(">");
00132                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Prefix))
00133                     {
00134                         Builder.Append(Prefix).Append(" ");
00135                     }
00136                     Builder.Append(FirstName).Append(" ");
00137                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(MiddleName))
00138                     {
00139                         Builder.Append(MiddleName).Append(" ");
00140                     }
00141                     Builder.Append(LastName);
00142                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Suffix))
00143                     {
00144                         Builder.Append(" ").Append(Suffix);
00145                     }
00146                     Builder.Append("</a>");
00147                 }
00148                 Builder.Append("<span class=\"n\" style=\"display:none;\"><span class=\"family-name\">").Append(LastName).Append("</span><span class=\"given-name\">").Append(FirstName).Append("</span></span>");
00149                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(DirectDial))
00150                 {
00151                     Builder.Append("<div class=\"tel\"><span class=\"type\">Work</span> ").Append(DirectDial).Append("</div>");
00152                 }
00153                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Email))
00154                 {
00155                     Builder.Append("<div>Email: <a class=\"email\" href=\"mailto:").Append(StripHTML(Email)).Append("\">").Append(StripHTML(Email)).Append("</a></div>");
00156                 }
00157                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Organization))
00158                 {
00159                     Builder.Append("<div>Organization: <span class=\"org\">").Append(Organization).Append("</span></div>");
00160                 }
00161                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Title))
00162                 {
00163                     Builder.Append("<div>Title: <span class=\"title\">").Append(Title).Append("</span></div>");
00164                 }
00165                 Builder.Append("</div>");
00166                 return Builder.ToString();
00167             }
00168             catch { throw; }
00169         }
00170         #endregion
00171 
00172         #region Private Functions
00173 
00174         private static string StripHTML(string HTML)
00175         {
00176             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(HTML))
00177                 return string.Empty;
00178 
00179             HTML = STRIP_HTML_REGEX.Replace(HTML, string.Empty);
00180             HTML = HTML.Replace("&nbsp;", " ");
00181             return HTML.Replace("&#160;", string.Empty);
00182         }
00183 
00184         private static readonly Regex STRIP_HTML_REGEX = new Regex("<[^>]*>", RegexOptions.Compiled);
00185 
00186         #endregion

00243
